Model

Class EntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Model.EntitySystem

  • public class EntitySystem
extends java.util.Observable
    Control the logic and flow of the game Observable - If there is a change in logic, call all the observers that subscribes to it
    Author:
    Wong Tiong Kiat and Choe Choon Ho
